column5: Looks like a great show about the geology and history of the lower st-laurent ..it's on TVO right now.
Wish i saw this earlier, this really interesting. Thanks for posting this.
Great show been watching and PVR'ing it. They have a Youtube channel so you can watch a lot of stuff online that was included in the show. Check it out if you missed the show.  Nemo
THanks Nemo   I believe this is the youtube channel you speak of  http://www.youtube.com/user/LivingHistoryMMedia?feature=watch
